name: Raveyard (BaileyS, MichaelFalcone, Ray, Emily Blane, Innesthetic, DanP_Games)
name_original: Raveyard (BaileyS, MichaelFalcone, Ray, Emily Blane, Innesthetic, DanP_Games)
description:
Welcome to Raveyard, where your bones can hake, rattle, and roll!

Chad Ravington the Necromancer misses his dearly departed friends! It's been ages since they had a real party. Time for him to dust off his spellbook and get those old bones rolling out of their graves!

All you need to play is your mouse by clicking on the right tiles to get those skeletons jumping onto the dance floor! Try to get all the skeletons out in as few moves as possible.

Created in under 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022 by a team of postgraduate students at Abertay University, Raveyard utilizes adorable pixel graphics and goofy animations in a play off the Global Game Jam theme of "duality." By having color and movement to what's supposed to be a bleak, still place, we're making something scary into something vibrant and silly; we want to make you laugh instead of feeling sad!
